body: {"data": {"viewLayout": {"productRatings": {"ratingsSummary": {"sectionTitleString": "Customer Reviews", "ratingsValueString": "Average rating: {rating}", "ratingsAmountString": "({amount})", "ratingsSummaryAriaLabelString": "Average rating: {rating} out of 5 stars, based on {amount} reviews", "ratingAriaLabelString": "{percent} percent of reviews have {stars} stars", "__typename": "ProductRatingsRatingsSummarySection"}, "__typename": "ProductRatingLayout"}, "productReviews": {"create": null, "header": {"sectionTitleString": "Reviews", "__typename": "ProductReviewsHeaderSection"}, "review": {"noReviewsString": "No reviews for this product yet.", "showEmptyReviewsVariant": "false", "seeMoreString": "See more", "__typename": "ProductReviewsReviewSection"}, "sort": {"sortTitleString": "Sort reviews by", "mostRelevantLabelString": "Most Relevant", "mostRecentLabelString": "Most Recent", "highestRatedLabelString": "Highest Rated", "lowestRatedLabelString": "Lowest Rated", "sortTrackingEvent": {"name": "store.item_details_sort_reviews", "__typename": "Tracking"}, "__typename": "ProductReviewsSortSection"}, "viewMore": {"viewAllTitleString": "See all reviews ({amount})", "viewMoreTitleString": "See more reviews ({amount})", "__typename": "ProductReviewsViewMoreSection"}, "__typename": "ProductReviewLayout"}, "__typename": "ViewLayouts"}}, "extensions": {"cacheControl": {"version": 1, "hints": [{"maxAge": 3600, "scope": "PRIVATE", "path": ["viewLayout"]}]}}}
